longBusinessSummary: Ayujoy Herbals Ltd., a research and testing organization, provides technical and regulatory consulting for biotechnical products, pharmaceuticals, diagnostics, medical equipment, and devices. The company serves various pharmaceutical companies in India and Southeast Asia to get FDA approval and facilitate exports of pharmaceuticals, and medical products and devices to the United States. Its services include analytical QC, QA functions, readiness for inspections, compliance, validation, clinical trial management, regulatory/legal, preparation of regulatory filings, compliance assessments, risk assessments, mock FDA audits, medical device support, CMC support, GMP training, facility layout consulting, and training, as well as utilities, process, IT, computer, and cleaning validation services. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is based in Mumbai, India.

companyOfficers.name: Ms. Dipika  Purohit
